org.gearvrf

Class GVRBillboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBehavior
          • org.gearvrf.GVRBillboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRDrawFrameListener

    public class GVRBillboard
extends GVRBehavior
    A billboard is a component that can be attached to a scene object to make it always face the camera. Note that the up-vector of the sceneobject does not change with the camera orientation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
